abstract: Sergio Garcia takes third-round lead at Castello Masters golf tournament in Spain; other golf results noted.
snippet: Sergio García shot a seven-under-par 64 to extend his lead to eight shots after the third round of the Castello Masters in Castellón, Spain.
lead_paragraph: Sergio García shot a seven-under-par 64 to extend his lead to eight shots after the third round of the Castello Masters in Castellón, Spain.
